 Core purpose and focus of the team
   

  

 Signoff Group is all about delivering comprehensive, high\\-performance, high\\-value solutions for VLSI Design and manufacturing to our customers while driving growth. **We Are:**

* Collaborating closely with product teams, R\\&D, and other stakeholders to relay customer feedback and contribute to the ongoing enhancement of our signoff tools.

* Drive continuous product improvement by channeling user feedback and real\\-world insights to R\\&D and product management teams.
* Strengthen Synopsys’ reputation as a trusted technology partner and industry leader in signoff and ECO solutions.
* Empower customers to achieve higher performance, better quality, and more efficient design closure at advanced technology nodes.
* Contribute to the growth and success of the Applications Engineering team by sharing knowledge, mentoring colleagues, and fostering an inclusive, collaborative environment.


**What You’ll Need:**

**The Team You’ll Be A Part Of:**
 You will join the high\\-performing Synopsys Signoff Group, a team dedicated to delivering comprehensive, high\\-value solutions for VLSI design and manufacturing. As part of the Applications Engineering team, you will work alongside experts in STA, ECO, and digital design, collaborating with R\\&D, product engineering, and marketing teams. The group is focused on accelerating design closure and enabling independent, high\\-quality analysis through the industry\\-leading PrimeTime and PrimeClosure platforms—trusted solutions used by top chip design companies worldwide.
